item.title: How To: Make Bonuses for exp rate
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Perses Pkers, post:3, topic:365782”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=461980.msg3379530#msg3379530 date=1287911526]

ok now… my EXP rate For All my stats is “16” i want a 1.1 Bonus on it Can Anyone Help…? ==317, Delta==
Code

TotalExp = (double)(16*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else {

Change the amount to 1.1x more?
[/quote]ik your trying to help but… that don’t help me at the least bit…[/quote]

You said you want a 1.1 bonus, so if you do that you’ll have a 1.1 bonus. Please be more clear. Do you mean on a specific weapon? For a specific time?

Read full topic
item.source: How To: Make Bonuses for exp rate
